name: Be amazed
description:
Be a'maze'ed is a game about a little hooded guy making it through a maze.
Be a'maze'ed is still in the working process so therefore there is only the walls start and finish in the game at the moment.
The core of this games concept is that you can make your own levels and then you can share them with others through a code and they can then play your levels!!!

Controls:
Move: WASD
Restart level: R
Pause: Q
Toggle build mode: Click the button in the pause screen
Toggle build block: E
Rotate block: R
Get Level code: C
Submit and play level: X and insert code
Change skin: Click Z and enter skin code (0000 for the hooded guy)
